items.title: Palo Alto Networks Integrates Vertex AI for Real-Time Threat Analysis
items.description: The cybersecurity giant is migrating its key workloads to Googleâ€™s Vertex AI platform to leverage Gemini models for faster automated threat detection and governance [web:5].

items.title: Australia Sanctions Two Russian Dark Web Services and Operators for Cyber Attacks
items.description: The Australian Government, with UK and US allies, has sanctioned two Russian men and their companies, Media Land LLC and ML.Cloud LLC, for enabling cyber attacks including DDoS, malware, and ransomware against Australian targets[3].

items.title: Sanctions on Russian Cybercrime Providers Targeting Australia Imposed
items.description: Australia imposes financial and travel sanctions on Media Land LLC, ML.Cloud LLC, and individuals Volosovik and Zatolokin for supporting cyber incidents like ransomware and DDoS against Australian businesses[5].

items.title: ASD Updates Guidelines for System Hardening
items.description: The Australian Signals Directorate releases December 2025 guidelines for system hardening as part of the Information Security Manual, aimed at large organisations and government[4].
